meanings.sent1: After disappearing, the magician was rematerializing on stage.
meanings.sent2: The ghost was rematerializing in front of our eyes.
meanings.sent3: The toy car kept rematerializing every time it was thrown out the window.
meanings.sent4: The memories of her childhood were rematerializing in her mind like old photographs coming to life.
meanings.sent5: The morning mist was rematerializing into dewdrops on the grass.

meanings.sent1: The fog was rematerializing into clouds above the mountains.
meanings.sent2: The spaceship was rematerializing after its journey through space.
meanings.sent3: The spilled milk seemed to be rematerializing back into the glass.
meanings.sent4: The dreams of the future were rematerializing in his mind, filling him with hope.
meanings.sent5: The scattered puzzle pieces were rematerializing into a complete picture.
